sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RAPHAIM or Rephaim, a name signifying Giants, as they really were, and an actual people too, situated in Ba-san or Batanea, beyond Jordan, and separated from the Zan-zummim by the river Jabbok. Thi√† is also the name of a valley near Jemsalem.
